attributes.action: criminalise company fraud disguised as computer or employee error
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many companies are hiding theft and fraud behind plausible claims of computer or employee error. When it can be proven that it is in fact company policy - not error - it should be treated as the criminal offence it is.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
